title: Let's get started
subtitle: Add a new listing
content:
His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls. A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table.

Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame.

formBlocks.title: Basic
formBlocks.content: Provide information about the item you are listing. This affects how the item is shown in social networks and on search results.

inputs.label: Short social item description
inputs.name: form_social
inputs.help: This is the short one or two sentence description that will be used to describe the item when linked out to social networks like Twitter and Facebook.

inputs.label: Full page item description
inputs.name: form_description
inputs.help: This is the full description that will appear on the page on Contrib alongside the bidding box etc.

formBlocks.title: Photos
formBlocks.content: Provide a number of photos that show the item off from a couple of angles as well as any standout markings, endorsements etc.

formBlocks.title: Video
formBlocks.content: Provide a single video (preferably in portrait mode) that shows the item off and talks to what makes it special.

formBlocks.title: Starting price
formBlocks.content: The starting price for the item which determines the minimum amount that can be bid. The item will not sell if no bids at or above this price are received.

formBlocks.title: Start date & time
formBlocks.content: When the auction should start - we need to determine a timezone here?

formBlocks.title: Duration
formBlocks.content: How long the auction should run for. Shorter auctions play to intensity and instant gratification. Longer auctions can achieve higher prices with longer exposure.

title: Complete
content: Thank you! Your listing is now viewable and will start at the specified time.
